member.name: T:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent
member.summary: A class that derives from that allows the creation of ads in an XNA app.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Initialize(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Game,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the AdGameComponent singleton.
member.param: A Game object that will contain the AdGameComponent.
The application ID of the app. This value is provided to you when you register the app with pubCenter.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Initialize(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Game,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the AdGameComponent singleton.
member.param: A Game object that will contain the AdGameComponent.
The application ID of the app. This value is provided to you when you register the app with pubCenter.
The 2-character country or region code where the user is running the app. This value is the same for all DrawableAd objects.
The postal code of the user of the app.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Update(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Advances the state of all ads based on the values of the gameTime parameter.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of the timing values.
member.exception: The LoadContent method was not called.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Draws the graphical elements of the ads.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values.
member.remarks: This call should be made after all other Draw calls. Ads should not be covered by other graphical elements.
member.exception: The LoadContent method was not called.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.CreateAd(System.String,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new instance of .
member.param: The unique identifier for the ad. The AdUnitId.
The rectangle in which the ad will be rendered.
Specifies whether the DrawableAd is refreshed automatically with new ads from the server.
member.exception: The property ApplicationId is null or empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.CreateAd(System.String,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle)
member.summary: Create a new instance of with the IsAutoRefresheEnabled property set to true as the default value.
member.param: The unique identifier for the ad. The AdUnitId.
The rectangle in which the ad will be rendered.
member.exception: The ApplicationId is null or empty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.RemoveAd(Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd)
member.summary: Removes an instance of from the AdGameComponent. The DrawableAd is no longer updated or rendered.
member.param: The instance of the to remove.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.RemoveAll
member.summary: Remove all instances of from the AdGameComponent.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Current
member.summary: Returns the AdGameComponent singleton.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.ApplicationId
member.summary: The application ID of the app. This value is provided to you when you register the app with pubCenter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.Engaged
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user is currently interacting with one of the ads.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.InputConsumed
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the input to the app was consumed by an ad.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.CountryOrRegion
member.summary: The 2-character country or region code where the user is running the app. This value is the same for all DrawableAd objects.
member.remarks: The country or region codes are specified by the ISO 3166-1 standard. This standard is available at http://www.iso.org/iso/country_codes/iso_3166_code_lists/english_country_names_and_code_elements.htm.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.PostalCode
member.summary: The postal code of the user of the app.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.EngagedChanged
member.summary: Raised when the Engaged property changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.AdGameComponent.InputConsumedChanged
member.summary: Raised when the InputConsumed property changes.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd
member.summary: Represents an individual ad within the context of an XNA app.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.Refresh

summary.para: A call to this method directs the DrawableAd to show the next ad as soon as an ad becomes available.
This method may not be used when the IsAutoRefreshEnabled property is set to true.

member.remarks: An ad might be unavailable because of an error that occurred while trying to contact the ad platform.
member.exception: IsAutoRefreshEnabled is set to the value true.
The Engaged property is set to the value true.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.MinimumWidth
member.summary: Gets the minimum accepted width for an ad.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.MinimumHeight
member.summary: Gets the minimum accepted height for an ad.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.EngagedChanged
member.summary: Raised when the Engaged property changes.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.ErrorOccurred
member.summary: Raised when the ad encounters an exception or error.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.AdRefreshed
member.summary: Raised when an ad becomes available.

member.name: E:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.VisibleChanged
member.summary: Raised when the Visible property changes value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.Keywords
member.summary: Gets or sets the keywords as a comma-separated list. Keywords allow the app to show ads that are relevant to the user.
member.exception: Search keywords cannot exceed the maximum allowed length.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.LocationLatitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the latitude information for the DrawableAd. This property can be used by search ads.
member.exception: Latitude cannot exceed maximum and minimum values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.LocationLongitude
member.summary: Gets or sets the longitude information for the DrawableAd. This property can be used by search ads.
member.exception: Longitude cannot exceed maximum and minimum values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.AdUnitId
member.summary: Gets the ad unit id for this DrawableAd instance.

remarks.para: This value is provided to the publisher when the publisher creates an ad unit in pubCenter. See the Publisher Onboarding Guide for more information.
This property is set when the DrawableAd is first created. It cannot be modified.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.Engaged
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the ad is currently engaged by the user.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.AutoRefreshEnabled
member.summary: Gets a value specifying whether the DrawableAd is configured to automatically refresh itself with new ads from the server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.DisplayRectangle
member.summary: Gets or sets the rectangle in which the ad will be rendered.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the ad.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.DropShadowEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a drop shadow should be drawn under the ad.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.BorderEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a border should be overlayed on the ad.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.Mobile.Xna.DrawableAd.BorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border to be overlayed on the ad.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Advertising.AdErrorEventArgs
member.summary: The AdErrorEventArgs class contains information about errors that occur when ads are retrieved from the ad server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Advertising.AdErrorEventArgs.Error
member.summary: The Exception that triggered the error event.
